short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the 5e.tools website with additional features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The aim is to improve functionality for the website 5e.tools.
The extensions search the page for imperial units like mile and pounds and converts it in the metrical system using an internal conversion (not customizable)
